contentList.content: You are <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with this Shield while using it.

The wearer has a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> as long as they have <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_FIRE_HEAT">Heat</LSTag>.
